testcase.name: Scenario-1: Music tracks API availablity and performance
Scenario-2: Each track has a unique ID and segment type music
Scenario-3: Each track has a primary title
Scenario-4: Only one track is currently playing
Scenario-5: Response header date is today

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected header "Date" was not "Sat, 21 Sep 2024 23:53:54 GMT", was "Sat, 21 Sep 2024 23:53:55 GMT". Headers are: Server=nginx/1.18.0 (Ubuntu) Content-Type=application/json Transfer-Encoding=chunked Connection=keep-alive Cache-Control=max-age=30, public, s-maxage=30, stale-if-error=7200, stale-while-revalidate=7200 Date=Sat, 21 Sep 2024 23:53:55 GMT Pragma=public X-RateLimit-Limit=60 X-RateLimit-Remaining=55
